casebody.data:
Standard Transportation Company, Appellee, v. THE S. S. CALVIN AUSTIN, Her Engines, etc., Eastern Steamship Lines, Inc., Appellant. No. 7. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 1, 1930. Haight, Smith, Griffin & Deining, of New York City (Henry M. Hewitt, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Macklin, Brown, Lenahan & Speer, of New York City (Horace L. Cheyney, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PEE CUEIAM.

Decree affirmed.
